Mutation++  v1.0.0
Multicomponent Thermodynamic And Transport Properties for Ionized gases in C++
Todo List
Member Vibrator::relaxationTime (const class Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics &thermo) const
Find better solution to limit dependency to just thermodynamic state information, not whole mixture.
Class Kinetics
Currently, intermediate values are always recomputed even if they don't need to be. An detailed look should be made into how to save computations when, for instance, the temperature does not change. This also holds true for the jacobian. For example, if the source terms were just computed, there is no need to recompute the reaction rate coefficients in the jacobian evaluation.
Class LookupTable< IndexType, DataType, FunctionType >
Need to add operator= and copy constructor functions to protect the pointer.
Member Mutation::Numerics::simp1 (const Real *const tableau, const int n, const int mm, const int *const ll, const int nll, const bool use_abs, int &kp, Real &bmax)
This function is probably better suited as a LpProblem class where the initial tableau setup is completed in the constructor and a solve() method could be used which actually performs the simplex method. This way, it might be possible to save large parts of the initial tableau for problems where the constraint vectors change. Later if a sparse lp solver is added, the constructor for an LpProblem class could make the determination of which solver to use based on the sparsity of the constraint matrix.
Class Nasa9NewDB
Finalize the new NASA-9 database and provide a better name.
Class NasaPolynomial< NR, NC >
Nasa9Polynomial does not actually derive from this so I should figure out how make this nicer.
Member OmegaI::source ()
consider the ionization energy for N and O from an already excited state as suggested by Johnston (PhD thesis)
Member ParticleRRHO::ParticleRRHO (const Mutation::Utilities::IO::XmlElement &xml_element)
Implement error checking, units conversion, and ParticleType checking.
Member RamshawDiffMat::diffusionMatrix ()
This method currently breaks the symmetry property of the diffusion matrix. It should be reformulated to return a symmetric matrix which would be faster to compute and use.
Member RrhoDB::cp (double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel, double *const cp, double *const cpt, double *const cpr, double *const cpv, double *const cpel)
Compute \(C_P\) directly instead of using finite-differencs.
Member RrhoDB::gibbs (double Th, double Te, double Tr, double Tv, double Tel, double P, double *const g, double *const gt, double *const gr, double *const gv, double *const gel)
Compute the individual components of the Gibbs function directly instead of H - TS.

making mp_X and a EigenVector
Member StateModel::addTransferTerm (int i, Mutation::Transfer::TransferModel *p_term)
add a removeTransferTerm for the case wehen the source term is negative, e.g, solving Vibrational and Electronic energy equations
Member StateModel::energyTransferSource (double *const p_omega)
loop over all energy equations making the source term for the total energy equal to zero
